# check linux version
// check apache
httpd -v
// check nginx
nginx -v
// check ubuntu
lsb_release -a

# restart Apache cPanel
/scripts/restartsrv_httpd --start

# create dir
mkdir -p -m 777 /var/www/html/dienminhphu.com/public_html

# add ssh
// get ssh key from macos:
ssh-keygen -t rsa
pbcopy < ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
vi ~/.ssh/authorized_keys

ssh-rsa  phuongdinh@Phuongs-MacBook-Air.local


ssh-rsa  phuocnguyen@phuocs-MacBook-Pro.local


ssh-rsa  admin@PC
